record.field: Report "%(report)s" must be cancelled before deletion.
The next invoices are related to Verifactu books: %(invoices)s. If you edit them be careful that you need to update to Verifactu again
The next invoices are related to Verifactu books in draft state.
There are some reports in draft and/or confirmed. No report will be created until these reports will be processed.
The party of the invoice %(invoice)s must have a valid Tax Identifier.
The invoice %(invoice)s has a wrong subject and operation Verifactu combination.
The party [%(party)s] of the invoice %(invoice)s must have a valid Verifactu Identifier [VAT (only for intracommunity operators)].
Invoice "%(invoice)s" must be posted, paid or refunded.
Invoice "%(invoice)s" is duplicated in Verifactu Report "%(report)s".

The parties of the invoices "%(invoices)s" have the Verifactu Identifier as 'Simplified Invoice'. The Verifactu operation key will be switched to 'Simplified Invoice (ticket)' or 'Invoice summary entry' as appropriate, and the invoices will be sent to AEAT without destination identification.

The parties of the invoices "%(invoices)s" have not set the Verifactu Identifier as 'Simplified Invoice', but the invoice Verifactu operation key is set as 'Simplified Invoice (ticket)' or 'Invoice summary entry'. The invoices will be sent to AEAT without destination identification.
There isn't a certificate defined in the account configuration for the Verifactu.
The invoices "%(invoices)s" do not have reference.
The invoice "%(invoice)s" does not have the necessary Verifactu keys filled.
